title: The little Duck is Missing D: (Help find him)
body:
This is the little duck who used to swim the river on the right side of mid lane, he used to be visible at the 1:20 mark and is one of the best and cutest little  creatures that inhabit the new summoners rift, however i have not seen him in a while and the last couple of games i waited for him and he did not appear, i don't know if riot has updated the rift's wildlife and moved or removed him, or if it is a bug, but I'm worried, if anyone knows where he is now and when he appears, let me know, keep a lookout for him while you play your games!

and if riot has removed him could you please tell us. and hopefully bring him back :) 
i miss him :(

replies.body: Honestly, I am actually so glad that im not the only person to notice this little fella! xD

Thankyou Lord Sesshomaru for another wonderfully insightful, by no means purely subjective or nonsensical post
You're truly a pillar of the community whether it's addressing this pressing issue or bringing to attention the fact that Vayne is empiracally imbalanced, you are a wise and noble sage
Also vayne IS fucked, I know because I play her.
I hear The Duck is having a sion level rework, why does rito do dis.
